system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision dynamic list. Implementation interface." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2017-05-03 08:56:14 -0700 (Wed, 03 May 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100317 $"
deferred class ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xmlEV_DYNAMIC_LIST_I [G -> ../interface/ev_containable.xmlEV_CONTAINABLE]
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
feature -- Access
f_interface_item../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_interface_iteminterface_item: G obsolete "Use `item' instead. [2017-05-31]" -- Current item but guaranteed attached for calling from interface only require readable: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex > 0 and then ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex <= ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount do Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_i_thi_th (../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex) end
f_item../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem: G -- Current item require readable: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex > 0 and then ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex <= ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount do Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_i_thi_th (../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex) ensure not_void: Result /= Void end
f_index../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Index of current position
f_cursor../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_cursorcursor: ../interface/ev_dynamic_list_cursor.xmlEV_DYNAMIC_LIST_CURSOR [G] -- Current cursor position. local an_item: detachable like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem l_index: FalseINTEGER_32 do l_index := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex if l_index > 0 and then l_index <= ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount then an_item := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem end create Result.../interface/ev_dynamic_list_cursor.xml#f_makemake (an_item, l_index <= 0, l_index > ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount) ensure not_void: Result /= Void end
f_interface_i_th../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_interface_i_thinterface_i_th (i: FalseINTEGER_32): G obsolete "Use `i_th' instead. [2017-05-31]" -- Current i_th item but guaranteed attached for calling from interface only require readable: i > 0 and then i <= ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount do Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_i_thi_th (i) end
f_i_th../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_i_thi_th (i: FalseINTEGER_32): G -- Item at i-th position. require i_within_bounds: i > 0 and then i <= ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount deferred ensure not_void: Result /= Void end
f_off../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_offoff: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is there no current item? do Result := (../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex = 0) or (../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex = ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount + 1) end
f_index_of../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_index_ofindex_of (v: detachable like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem; i: FalseINTEGER_32): FalseINTEGER_32 -- Index of i_th item v, if present. -- As dynamic list descendants are all sets, -- Result will be zero for all values of i -- that are not equal to one require positive_occurrences: i > 0 local an_index: FalseINTEGER_32 do if i = 1 then from an_index := 1 until Result > 0 or else an_index > ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount loop if ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_i_thi_th (an_index) = v then Result := an_index end an_index := an_index + 1 end end end
f_retrieve_item_by_data../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_retrieve_item_by_dataretrieve_item_by_data (data: detachable FalseANY; should_compare_objects: FalseBOOLEAN): detachable G -- Result is first item in Current with data -- matching some_data. Compare objects if -- should_compare_objects otherwise compare references. local l_item: like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem l_count: like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount l_index: like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex do from l_index := 1 l_count := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount until l_index = l_count + 1 or Result /= Void loop l_item := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_i_thi_th (l_index) if (should_compare_objects and then data ~ l_item.../interface/ev_any.xml#f_datadata) or (not should_compare_objects and data = l_item.../interface/ev_any.xml#f_datadata) then Result := l_item end l_index := l_index + 1 end end
f_retrieve_items_by_data../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_retrieve_items_by_dataretrieve_items_by_data (data: FalseANY; should_compare_objects: FalseBOOLEAN): FalseARRAYED_LIST [G] -- Result is all items in Current with data -- matching some_data. Compare objects if -- should_compare_objects otherwise compare references. local l_item: like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem l_index: like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex l_count: like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount do create Result.Falsemake (0) from l_index := 1 l_count := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount until l_index = l_count + 1 loop l_item := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_i_thi_th (l_index) check l_item /= Void end if (should_compare_objects and then data ~ l_item.../interface/ev_any.xml#f_datadata) or (not should_compare_objects and data = l_item.../interface/ev_any.xml#f_datadata) then Result.Falseextend (l_item) end l_index := l_index + 1 end end
feature -- Measurement
f_count../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Number of items. deferred end
feature -- Status report
f_valid_cursor../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_valid_cursorvalid_cursor (p: FalseCURSOR): FalseBOOLEAN -- Can the cursor be moved to position p? -- This is True if p conforms to EV_DYNAMIC_LIST_CURSOR and -- if it points to an item, Current must have it. do Result := attached {like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_cursorcursor} p as dlc and then (dlc.../interface/ev_dynamic_list_cursor.xml#f_itemitem = Void or else (attached dlc.../interface/ev_dynamic_list_cursor.xml#f_itemitem as l_dlc_item and then ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (l_dlc_item))) end
f_has../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (v: detachable like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem): FalseBOOLEAN -- Does structure contain v? local i: FalseINTEGER_32 do from i := 1 until Result or else i > ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount loop Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_i_thi_th (i) = v i := i + 1 end end
feature -- Cursor movement
f_start../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_startstart -- Move cursor to first position. do ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := 1 ensure index_on_first: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex = 1 end
f_back../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_backback -- Move to previous item. require not_before: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex > 0 do ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex - 1 end
f_forth../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_forthforth -- Move cursor to next position. require not_after: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex <= ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount do ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex + 1 end
f_go_i_th../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_go_i_thgo_i_th (i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Move cursor to i-th position. do ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := i if ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex < 0 then ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := 0 elseif ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex > ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount + 1 then ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount + 1 end end
f_go_to../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_go_togo_to (p: FalseCURSOR) -- Move cursor to position p. local dlc: detachable ../interface/ev_dynamic_list_cursor.xmlEV_DYNAMIC_LIST_CURSOR [G] do dlc ?= p check dlc_not_void: dlc /= Void then end if dlc.../interface/ev_dynamic_list_cursor.xml#f_afterafter then ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount + 1 elseif dlc.../interface/ev_dynamic_list_cursor.xml#f_beforebefore then ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := 0 elseif attached dlc.../interface/ev_dynamic_list_cursor.xml#f_itemitem as l_item then ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_index_ofindex_of (l_item, 1) else check False end end end
f_move../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_movemove (i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Move cursor i positions. do ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex + i if ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex < 0 then ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := 0 elseif ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex > ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount + 1 then ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount + 1 end end
feature -- Element change
f_append../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_appendappend (s: FalseSEQUENCE [G]) -- Append a copy of s. Do not move cursor. require sequence_not_void: s /= Void do from s.Falsestart until s.Falseoff loop ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_extendextend (s.Falseitem) s.Falseforth end ensure count_increased: old ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount + s.Falsecount = ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount end
f_extend../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_extendextend (v: like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem) -- Add v to end. Do not move cursor. require v_not_void: v /= Void do ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_insert_i_thinsert_i_th (v, ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount + 1) if ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex = ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount then ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex + 1 end ensure has_v: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (v) end
f_replace../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_replacereplace (v: like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem) -- Replace current item by v. require writable: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex > 0 and then ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex <= ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount v_not_void: v /= Void do ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_remove_i_thremove_i_th (../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex) ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_insert_i_thinsert_i_th (v, ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex) ensure has_v: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (v) end
f_put_front../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_put_frontput_front (v: like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem) -- Add v at beginning. Do not move cursor. require v_not_void: v /= Void do ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_insert_i_thinsert_i_th (v, 1) if ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex > 0 then ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex + 1 end ensure has_v: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (v) end
f_put_right../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_put_rightput_right (v: like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem) -- Add v to the right of cursor position. Do not move cursor. require v_not_void: v /= Void do ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_insert_i_thinsert_i_th (v, ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex + 1) ensure has_v: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (v) end
f_put_left../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_put_leftput_left (v: like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem) -- Add v to the left of cursor position. Do not move cursor. require v_not_void: v /= Void do ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_insert_i_thinsert_i_th (v, ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex) ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex + 1 ensure has_v: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (v) end
f_put_i_th../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_put_i_thput_i_th (v: like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem; i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Replace item at i-th position by v. require valid_index: i > 0 and i <= ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount v_not_void: v /= Void do ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_insert_i_thinsert_i_th (v, i) ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_remove_i_thremove_i_th (i + 1) ensure has_v: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (v) end
f_merge_left../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_merge_leftmerge_left (other: like ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface) -- Merge other into current structure before cursor -- position. Do not move cursor. Empty other. local v: like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem do from other.../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_startstart until other.Falseis_empty loop v := other.../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_itemitem check v /= Void end other.../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_removeremove ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_insert_i_thinsert_i_th (v, ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex) ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex + 1 end end
f_merge_right../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_merge_rightmerge_right (other: like ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface) -- Merge other into current structure after cursor -- position. Do not move cursor. Empty other. local v: like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem do from until other.Falseis_empty loop other.Falsefinish v := other.../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_itemitem check v /= Void end other.../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_removeremove ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_insert_i_thinsert_i_th (v, ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex + 1) end end
feature -- Removal
f_prune../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_pruneprune (v: like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem) -- Remove v if present. Do not move cursor, except if -- cursor was on v, move to right neighbor. local item_index: FalseINTEGER_32 do item_index := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_index_ofindex_of (v, 1) if item_index > 0 then if item_index <= ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex then ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex - 1 end ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_remove_i_thremove_i_th (item_index) end ensure cursor_not_moved: not old ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (v) implies old ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_indexindex = ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_indexindex cursor_not_moved: old ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (v) and then old ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_indexindex < old ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_index_ofindex_of (v, 1) implies ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex = old ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex cursor_not_moved: old ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (v) and then old ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xml#f_indexindex >= old ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_index_ofindex_of (v, 1) implies ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex = old ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex - 1 not_has_v: not ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (v) end
f_remove../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_removeremove -- Remove current item. Move cursor to right neighbor -- (or after if no right neighbor). require writable: not ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_offoff do ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_remove_i_thremove_i_th (../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex) if ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex > ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount + 1 then ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount + 1 end ensure not_has_v: not ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (old ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem) end
f_remove_left../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_remove_leftremove_left -- Remove item to the left of cursor position. -- Do not move cursor. require left_exists: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex > 1 not_before: not (../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex = 0) do ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex - 1 ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_remove_i_thremove_i_th (../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex) ensure then left_neighbor_removed: not ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (old ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_i_thi_th (../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex - 1)) end
f_remove_right../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_remove_rightremove_right -- Remove item to the right of cursor position. -- Do not move cursor. require right_exists: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex < ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount do ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_remove_i_thremove_i_th (../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex + 1) ensure then right_neighbor_removed: not ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_hashas (old ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_i_thi_th (../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex + 1)) end
f_wipe_out../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_wipe_outwipe_out -- Remove all items. local l_index: FalseINTEGER_32 do from l_index := ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount until l_index = 0 loop ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_go_i_thgo_i_th (l_index) ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_removeremove l_index := l_index - 1 end ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_go_i_thgo_i_th (l_index) end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_insert_i_th../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_insert_i_thinsert_i_th (v: like ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_itemitem; i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Insert v at position i. require i_within_bounds: i > 0 and i <= ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount + 1 deferred ensure count_increased: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount = old ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount + 1 end
f_remove_i_th../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_remove_i_thremove_i_th (i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Remove item at i-th position. require i_within_bounds: i > 0 and i <= ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount deferred ensure count_decreased: ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount = old ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount - 1 end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_dynamic_list.xmlEV_DYNAMIC_LIST [G] note option: stable attribute end
invariant index_within_bounds: ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_is_usableis_usable implies (../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex >= 0 and then ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_indexindex <= ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xml#f_countcount + 1)

end -- class ../implementation_interface/ev_dynamic_list_i.xmlEV_DYNAMIC_LIST_I
